info.description: Xarvis AI Assistant API with user management and WebSocket communication
info.title: Xarvis API

get.description: List all notes in the system with optional filtering (admin only)
List all projects in the system with optional filtering (admin only)
List all users with pagination (admin only)
Get a specific user by ID (admin only)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password

200.description: Login successful with user data and tokens

post.description: Refresh an expired access token using refresh token
Register a new user account with email and password

get.description: Retrieves the conversation history for the authenticated user including messages and memories

post.description: Creates a new memory entry for the authenticated user's conversation
Processes a user message through the conversation service and returns an AI-generated response
post.summary: Process user message and generate AI response

500.description: Internal server error or couldn't process message

get.description: List all notes for the authenticated user with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new note for the authenticated user

get.description: Search notes by content and/or tags for the authenticated user
Get notes filtered by specific tags for the authenticated user
Get a specific note by ID (user can only access their own notes)

put.description: Update a specific note (user can only update their own notes)

delete.description: Delete a specific note (user can only delete their own notes)

get.description: List all projects for the authenticated user with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new project for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific project by ID (user can only access their own projects)

put.description: Update a specific project (user can only update their own projects)

delete.description: Delete a specific project (user can only delete their own projects)

post.description: Add a progress event to a specific project

put.description: Update the status of a specific project

get.description: Get all notes/logs for a specific project

200.description: List of project notes/logs with pagination

post.description: Create a new note/log entry for a specific project

delete.description: Delete the current authenticated user's account

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's profile

put.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile

note.NoteResponse.description: Note information returned in API responses

project.AddProgressEventRequest.description: Request body for adding progress event

project.ProjectResponse.description: Project information returned in API responses

content.example: Remember to call John tomorrow at 3 PM

text.example: Hey friend, remind me to call a friend tomorrow

user.OffTimeRange.description: Time range when user is not available

user.UpdateUserRequest.description: Request body for updating user profile

user.UserResponse.description: User information returned in API responses (no sensitive data)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
